#summary Requirements
= Requirements =
There isn't much you require but some things.
 * [http://www.java.com/en/download/index.jsp Java](JRE6 and above.)
 * Run as Administrer(You will have to make sure that Java has administrer rights.)
 * [http://forums.heroesofnewerth.com/showthread.php?t=111678 HoNModManager(Java)](Not the default one, the Java version is the only one that will work.)
